s: In 2004 Pontine started Dr.Lipp with one product, ‘The Original Nipple Balm, for dry skin, luscious lips & glossy bits’. It was the first 100% natural multi-use skincare product to launch in the UK beauty market. Being a bit of a naturalist it was something we really believed in.
